record.name: knowledge management
record.kmhitliststyle:
<STYLE>
body{
PADDING-RIGHT: 0px;
  PADDING-LEFT:0px;
  FONT-SIZE: 11px;
  PADDING-BOTTOM:0px;
  MARGIN:0px;
  COLOR: #000000;
  PADDING-TOP:0px;
  FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff;
 BORDER-top:0px none #ffffff;
 BORDER-bottom:1px solid #99BBE8;
 border-left:0px none #ffffff; 
border-right:0px none #ffffff;
 SCROLLBAR-FACE-COLOR: #edf3fe; 
SCROLLBAR-SHADOW-COLOR: #edf3fe; 
SCROLLBAR-HIGHLIGHT-COLOR: #99BBE8; 
SCROLLBAR-3DLIGHT-COLOR: #edf3fe; 
SCROLLBAR-DARKSHADOW-COLOR: #99BBE8; 
SCROLLBAR-TRACK-COLOR:#edf3fe; 
SCROLLBAR-ARROW-COLOR: #92C0D1;
}

.listTable{
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  margin:0px;
  padding:0px;
  font-size: 11px;
  border-top: #ccc 0px solid;
  border-bottom: #ccc 1px solid;
  border-right: #ccc 1px solid;
  color: #000000;
  background: #ffffff;
}

.listTable TD{
  border-left: #ccc 1px solid;
  font-weight: normal;
  padding:4px 6px 4px 6px;
  color: #000000;
  line-height: 14px;
}  

.listTableEnd {
  border-right: #ccc 1px solid;
} 

.listTable TH{
  border-top: #ccc 1px solid;
  border-left: #ccc 1px solid;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding:4px;
  background: #E0E0E0;
  text-align: left;
}

.oddRow{
  //BACKGROUND: #edf3fe;
   BACKGROUND: #ffffff;
  color: #0000cc;
  padding-bottom: 25px;
}
.evenRow{
  padding-bottom: 25px;
  BACKGROUND: #ffffff;
  COLOR: #0000cc
}	
.listTable A{
  color: #0000CC;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-decoration: none;
}
	
.listTable A:HOVER{
  text-decoration: underline;
  color: #0000FF;
}

.fieldClass{
	float: none;
}
.resultMetadata{
	float: left;
	color: #41774a;
	padding-right: 20px; 	
}

.resultSummary{
	color: #000; 	
}

.resultLink{
	font-weight:bold;
	text-decoration:none;
    color: #2200d6;
}

a {
text-decoration:none;
}	

.queryTerm{
	font-weight:bold;
	text-decoration:none;
}	
.hithighlight{
  FONT-WEIGHT: bold;
}

.breadcrumb{
	TEXT-DECORATION:none;
}

.resultHeading{
  PADDING: 4px;
  TEXT-ALIGN:left;
  display: block;
  BACKGROUND: #F7F7F7;
}
.resultTable{
  font-size: 11px;
  PADDING: 4px;
   TEXT-ALIGN:left;
  display: block;
	height:658px;
  scrolling:auto;
}
.formSectionHeading {
  width: 100%;
  background: #CCCCCC;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 0px 0px 0px 4px ;
  margin: 20px 0px 10px 0px ;;
}

.formButtonContainer {
  background: #AABEDC;
  padding:4px;
  width:100%;
}
.knowledgeTemplateTitle{
  color:#000099;
  font-weight:normal;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;;
  font-size:26px;
  border-top: #ccc 0px solid;
  border-bottom: #ccc 1px solid;
  border-right: #ccc 0px solid;
  border-left: #ccc 0px solid;
  padding: 10px 6px 10px 6px ;
}

.knowledgeTemplate{
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  padding:10px;
  font-size: 11px;
  width: 80%;
}

.fieldLabel{
	float: left;
    color: #41774a;
    TEXT-ALIGN:left;
    padding-right: 4px; 
}
.label{
  TEXT-ALIGN:left;
}
em {
  color:blue;
}
</STYLE>
